original_text: The king and the people of Jerusalem were very afraid, because Gibeon was a great city. It was bigger than Ai, like a city with a king. All its men were brave soldiers.
korean_text: 크게 두려워하였으니 이는 기브온은 왕도와 같은 큰 성임이요 아이보다 크고 그 사람들은 다 강함이라

sentences.original_text: The king and the people of Jerusalem were very afraid
because Gibeon was a great city
like a city with a king
All its men were brave soldiers
sentences.korean_translation: 그 도시의 모든 남자들은 용감한 군인들이었다
